elements.label: The Trappings of Lantern Communions
elements.description: Amber and polished mirrors. The whitest candle wax and hollowed eggshells. Origami stars.

elements.label: The Trappings of Forge Praxis
elements.description: Shaved iron. A baked clay pot filled with ash. Nine sacred woods, to burn as fuel for the future.

elements.label: The Trappings of Edge Practices
elements.description: Viridian war paint. Ritual knives. Spent bullets.

elements.label: The Trappings of Winter Solemnities
elements.description: Graveyard earth. Polished bone. Idols of forgotten gods.

elements.label: The Trappings of Heart Ceremonies
elements.description: Hand drums and pinecones. A stag's heart and a boar's skin. A string of pearls, pink and white.

elements.label: The Trappings of Grail Sacraments
elements.description: Red berries and honey. A baby's caul and a mother's cord. Stained cups and scraped plates.

elements.label: The Trappings of Moth Rituals
elements.description: Dried flowers and potent leaves. Strange poppets and forgotten treasures. A set of childrens' teeth

elements.label: The Trappings of Knock Rites
elements.description: Locks and lockpicks. Venoms and hawthorne. A scalpel and a snakeskin.
